name: Van de Sant Innovations BV
membership:
Former member of Next Wave Plastics: https://www.nextwaveplastics.org/
Ocean Unite: http://www.oceanunite.org/
goal: We design and manufacture comfortable sustainable furniture, made from recovered (ocean) plastics. We want to stop deforestation, reduce plastic waste and CO2 emissions, create local jobs and make our products 100% circular.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Consumers, Education and training, Environment, International co-operation and development, Research and innovation, Trade, Youth
